review: When using it for travel it's not very effective. Because it uses the hotel wi-fi which complicate things
author: Eduardo Wainberg

review: Super complicated to get to work with my router. Even though Google says it should work by default it does not. I've already spent 3 hours messing with advanced router settings to no avail. Will try again. Google makes it sound super easy and it is if its default compatible with your router. This is definitely something to be aware of before buying.Worked great at my mother-in-law's though!
author: Michael
